techmeme.title: Nvidia shares close down 7% to $103.73, after falling ~23% since July 10, as investors pull back from large tech stocks amid doubts over AI spending paying off (Emily Forgash/Bloomberg)
Samsung Galaxy Watch Ultra review: premium materials and build quality, powerful Exynos processor, but large and bulky with only one size, and expensive (Steve Smith/SlashGear)
After users reported Meta's AI assistant incorrectly claimed the attempted assassination of Trump didn't happen, Meta blames hallucinations for the response (Alex Heath/The Verge)
Netflix files to raise $1.8B in a new debt offering, its first since the company was elevated to investment-grade status by Moody's and S&P Global (Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter)
Samsung reports Q2 revenue up 23.42% YoY to ~$53.45B, vs. ~$53.3B est., operating profit up 1,458% YoY to ~$7.5B, as AI memory chip demand remains strong (Sheila Chiang/CNBC)
